description: I. Letter dated 09/04/2009 from Lord Mandelson to Lord Goodhart regarding a supplementary delegated powers memorandum for the amendments to the Postal Services Bill (HL) 2008-09. 3 p. department: Dept for Business, Enterprise and Regulatory Reform
